1048050.name: Coloring Pixels - Technology Pack
1048050.description:
Technology Book

This technology themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by technology from the past, present, and future; expect to see breakthroughs from the stone age through to the space age.

Contents

The Technology book unlocks the following images:
  • Chemicals - 23x27
  • Robotics - 30x47
  • Fire - 48x44
  • Tools - 52x46
  • Circuit Boards - 61x61
  • Farming - 71x84
  • Plumbing - 81x59
  • Rocketry - 93x122
  • Phonograph - 100x100
  • Retro Gaming - 109x71
  • Books - 124x67
  • Aqueducts - 150x150
  • Steam Power - 168x180
  • Airships - 196x125
  • Drones - 200x200
  • Cloud Computing - 215x212
  • Automobiles - 219x137
  • Cloning - 270x177
  • Urbanization - 285x160
  • Renewable Energy - 300x300
